channel.title: Worldwide Newton Conference
channel.description: A sporadically annual gathering of Newton aficionados.
channel.dc:creator: grant@splorp.com

item.title: Announcing The Worldwide Newton Conference 2007
item.description: We are pleased to announce that the next Worldwide Newton Conference will be held in Tokyo, Japan. Scheduled for July 7 - 8, 2007, this is an event where Newton users, people interested in Newton technology and those in related fields can gather for lectures, workshops, exchange of information and casual chats. We hope that many people attend and get involved with this year's WWNC.
item.dc:subject: News

item.title: More WWNC Presentations Available on YouTube
item.description: The indubitable Sir Izaac has posted several more video snippets from the 2006 Worldwide Newton Conference featuring presentations from Paul Guyot and Walter Smith. A full list of current videos can be found on the resources page.
item.dc:subject: News
